knimeNode.name: QvxNodeAdapter
knimeNode.shortDescription: reads different QVX file formats and converts them into a readable table format with a two dimensional array

fullDescription.intro: Reading different stock greek symbols and securities in the NASDAQ European Stock Exchange Market

option.name: short name of first option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)
short name of third option (like in the dialog)
short name of fourth option (like in the dialog)
short name of fifth option (like in the dialog)
short name of sixth option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)

ports.inPort: reads various CSV files with different data types that can be understood by KNIME analytics
ports.outPort: stores the attributes of the CSV file in a two dimensional array that can be read and converted into a table format in KNIME analytics
